title: NOCO-NOCO ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC ALLIANCE WITH TESNOLOGY TO ADVANCE SMART CITY INITIATIVES - PR Newswire
summary: noco-noco Pte Ltd has formed a strategic alliance with TESNOLOGY to develop RCTnm devices that integrate advanced battery technology and distributed data management for smart city applications. This collaboration aims to enhance energy management and promote sustainability amidst climate concerns, creating a decentralized energy supply and optimizing electricity consumption. The RCTnm devices are designed to facilitate energy forecasting and empower citizens in decarbonization efforts. The innovation emphasizes transforming energy storage systems into holistic management hubs while maintaining data security.
green_innovation: TRUE - The alliance's focus on developing devices that enhance energy management, reduce emissions, and promote sustainability in smart cities clearly aligns with the goals of green innovation.
business_innovation: TRUE - The partnership and development of the RCTnm devices represent new product and process innovations that differ significantly from the firm's previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE - The RCTnm devices are designed to significantly reduce environmental impacts throughout their life cycle by optimizing energy consumption and facilitating sustainable practices.
green_process: TRUE - The methodologies involved in managing energy use and data without relying on high-emission data centers exemplify a green process that prioritizes sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 333999 - All Other Miscellaneous General Purpose Machinery Manufacturing, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 541715 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences (except Nanotechnology and Biotechnology), 926130 - Regulation and Administration of Communications, Electric, and Other Utilities.
greenwashing: FALSE - The article demonstrates a genuine commitment to sustainability without misleading claims, as it focuses on innovative technologies aimed at reducing environmental impacts.

title: SpinetiX launches iBX line with iBX410 player - Digital Signage Today
summary: Digital signage firm SpinetiX has launched its iBX line of players, debuting the iBX410 model, designed for 24/7 digital signage use. The iBX410 features the latest Intel Atom processor and runs on the SpinetiX digital signage operating system, with a focus on security and energy optimization. The launch reflects SpinetiX's commitment to innovation and their channel ecosystem.
green_innovation: FALSE, the article does not explicitly mention any environmental benefits or sustainability features related to the iBX410 model.
business_innovation: TRUE, the iBX410 is a new product line that introduces improvements in digital signage technology, thereby representing a significant innovation from the firm's previous offerings.
green_product: FALSE, while the iBX410 offers advanced technology for digital signage, it does not meet the definition of a green product as it does not significantly reduce environmental impact.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe any manufacturing or production processes that minimize environmental impacts or promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334310 - Audio and Video Equipment Manufacturing, 517919 - All Other Telecommunications, 541511 - Custom Computer Programming Services, 423430 - Computer and Computer Peripheral Equipment and Software Merchant Wholesalers
greenwashing: FALSE, there are no indications of misleading claims about the environmental benefits of the product; the focus is more on technical specifications and partnership growth.
